headline: Show HN: ImpactPharm //Get a team consultation with a pharmacist + a physician!
description:
Hey everyone!

My startup company makes a mobile application called ImpactPharm, which aims to bridge the gap in healthcare by virtually connecting patients to pharmacists.

We are seeking volunteers to participate in a 30-45 minute study to share what their experience is like using the app!

The study will take place via a Zoom video call with our User Experience team.

In exchange for your participation, you will receive a free 20-minute consultation with a pharmacist and a physician within the app.

This study will ultimately help us improve the user experience for future patients down the road.

How this app could be useful for you: Our ImpactPharm pharmacists will be your health coaches who can answer any questions you might have about your medications, vitamins, and supplements. With this app, you can build a strong foundation for a healthy life as you navigate different challenges of life.

If you are interested, please fill out the signup form below: https://forms.gle/vgyhNupRv8viWu1QA

We’ll reach out with further instructions, as well as a scheduling link, for those who fill out the form.

If you would like to read more about ImpactPharm, you can do so here:

Our Website: www.impactpharm.app

Press Release: https://www.newswire.com/news/impactpharm-launches-innovativ...

The ImpactPharm app is now available on the App Store on both Android and iOS/Apple for you to download:

Apple App Store: https://apps.apple.com/vn/app/impactpharm/id1624419611

Android App Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=us.impactpharm...

Thank you!

Sophie Le, PharmD Co-founder & CEO ImpactPharm, Inc
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: ImpactPharm //获得药剂师+医生的团队咨询!
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: ImpactPharm //獲得藥劑師+醫生的團隊諮詢!
